channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: House Democrats help Mike Johnson end government shutdown, fund DHS and ICE
item.description: More than 20 House Democrats voted with Republicans on Tuesday to reopen the government and keep the Department of Homeland Security funded for two we...

item.title: Iran risks Trump's ire with new diplomatic demands, provocations
item.description: Iran has demanded changes to the venue and format for negotiations with the U.S . this Friday, two sources with knowledge tell Axios. Meanwhile, the I...

item.title: Scoop: 200 miles of Trump's border wall held up by Noem's DHS
item.description: Multiple segments of border wall construction are being held up by lack of final sign-off from Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem, Axios has lear...

item.title: Gabbard says Trump asked her to attend FBI raid at Georgia elections hub
item.description: Director of National Intelligence Tulsi Gabbard said Monday President Trump requested her presence during an FBI search of an election center in Georg...

item.title: Mike Johnson clears critical hurdle to ending government shutdown
item.description: The House took the first step on Tuesday to end the partial government shutdown , starting debate on a package of appropriations bills and a short-ter...

item.title: How every House member voted on the shutdown and ICE funding
item.description: See how your representative voted to end the partial shutdown and fund most of the government through September. Congress only has ten days to reach a...

item.title: U.S. shoots down Iranian drone that approached aircraft carrier
item.description: Officials said the aircraft was “acting aggressively” when it approached the USS Abraham Lincoln, which is in the Middle East amid tensions between Wa...

item.title: House votes to end government shutdown, buy time for ICE talks
item.description: The deal would fund most of the government through September. But Congress would have only 10 days to fund the Department of Homeland Security.

item.title: Trump wants to ‘nationalize the voting,’ seeking to grab states’ power
item.description: Trump, who continues to falsely claim that he won the 2020 election, has baselessly alleged widespread fraud. The Senate’s Republican leader says he d...

item.title: Clintons finalize deal to appear for House Epstein investigation depositions
item.description: Bill and Hillary Clinton are expected to sit for depositions on Feb. 27 and Feb. 26, respectively.

item.title: Trump in Iowa tries to shift the conversation back to the economy
item.description: A brief swing through the farm state underscored administration fears about the midterms.

item.title: Americans give Trump low marks on handling of economy as midterms likely to center on affordability
item.description: Sixty-one percent of voters told a CNN poll released Friday that they disapprove of the way Trump is handling the economy.

item.title: Capitol agenda: Trump tests GOP with Fed probe
Ex-Trump voters swung hard to Democrats over costs in NJ & VA, new research shows
item.description: Voters who backed Donald Trump in 2024 and swung to Democrats in this year's Virginia and New Jersey elections did so over economic concerns, accordin...

item.title: Vance tries to thread affordability needle in Rust Belt
item.description: The vice president fine-tunes Trump’s economic message, but he's only got so much wiggle room.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
